code: public void testInvalidLevel() {     final IndicesStatsResponse response = new IndicesStatsResponse().     final String level = randomAlphaOfLength(16).     final ToXContent.Params params = new ToXContent.MapParams(Collections.singletonMap("level", level)).     final IllegalArgumentException e = expectThrows(IllegalArgumentException.class, () -> response.toXContent(JsonXContent.contentBuilder(), params)).     assertThat(e, hasToString(containsString("level parameter must be one of [cluster] or [indices] or [shards] but was [" + level + "]"))). }
